name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Injiniyan Software
summary: ƙwararren Mai Haɓaka Software, yana neman sabon damar yin aiki don manyan ayyuka. Ina sha'awar ƙirƙira ko ƙara lamba don wasu su yi amfani da su. Na yi imani basirata kadan ne idan aka kwatanta da intanet, don haka ina sha'awar aiki tare da wasu kayan aiki, ayyuka, harsunan shirye-shirye.

experience.title: Injiniyan Software
responsibilities: Ƙirƙira da aiwatar da aikace-aikacen gidan yanar gizo masu ƙima ta amfani da React da Node.js
Haɗin kai tare da manajojin samfur don daidaita buƙatun da tabbatar da isar da lokaci
API ɗin RESTful da aka haɓaka kuma ana kiyaye su don aikace-aikacen yanar gizo
Ƙirƙirar rubutun don sarrafa ayyuka da haɓaka aiki

experience.title: Mataimakin Kocin Tennis
responsibilities: Koyar da dabarun wasan tennis a cikin rukuni na 'yan wasa 5-10
Sanya darasi mai daɗi da nishadantarwa ga ƴan wasa
Mai alhakin kare lafiyar ’yan wasa a kotu, musamman kanana da manya, kamar masu shekara 3 da 60.

experience.title: Abokin Waje
responsibilities: Zabar oda don abokan cinikin kan layi
odar shirya kaya don jigilar kaya
Ana loda oda akan manyan motocin dakon kaya
Taimakawa abokan ciniki samun abubuwa a cikin shagon
Tsayar da yanayi mai aminci da abokantaka ga abokan ciniki da ma'aikata

projects.name: Fayil
projects.description: Gidan yanar gizo mai amsawa wanda ke nuna ayyuka da ƙwarewa ta amfani da fasahar yanar gizo na zamani
